english.segment1: Looking into your eyes I see all I want to be. And I don't want it to end. If I could only put into words the way I see you. I only know I have an angel with me now
english.segment2: And when I fall asleep your all that I see. You're in my thoughts and all of my prayers. I wish I could mean all that you mean to me. My angel without wings (My angel)
english.segment3: I wish you could see all that you mean to me. But I could never find the words to tell you
english.segment4: That when I fall asleep you're all that I see. You're in my thoughts and all of my prayers. I wish I could mean all that you mean to me. And when I fall asleep your all that I see. You're in my thoughts and all of my prayers. I wish I could mean all that you mean to me. My angel without wings.
